KPlugin.Name: Suavemente Dark
KPlugin.Description:
Suave, aka. what this theme is based on was made by phobian
I liked how the theme looked but its color didnt really fit my desktop background (gnome blobs) so i randomly decided to edit it and now im learning both plasma theming and inkscape through this while implementing what comes to my mind and looks cool:tm:. no i dont have any graphics design experience
This theme uses gruvbox colors :)

i dont think ill ever even share this theme idk why im even bothering to make a description
